name: Subtextual
overview:
Subtextual is a Los Angeles based startup that allows users to add context to selected recipients within an email. The product suite is based on patent-pending technology and is designed to address the relationship disparity that exists in digital communication.

Subtextual allows users to avoid common email miscommunication pitfalls through private, secure messages that can be sent to selected recipients in the To, Cc, or Bcc fields of an email. No plugins or downloads are necessary to view the private messages.

To download a free version or for more information, please visit www.subtextual.com.

funding_rounds.source_description: Bccthis, New Multiplatform Messaging Technology, Set to Revolutionize Communications With Tool for Outlook, Twitter and BlackBerry
